attributes.action: We need a public enquiry into Andy Coulson's conduct in public office and to what extent the Prime Minister was involved
attributes.additional_details: The public needs an immediate and full public inquiry into the recruitment, managment and conduct in public office of Andy Coulson that is broad enough in scope to assess how much the Prime Minister was involved in it if at all. We need this matter to be settled before the General Election in 2015.
